page.title: 09Schools in Bookham
page.content:
All pre-school playgroups and nursery schools are private, though with falling numbers, many children are starting at first school earlier.
There are 3 first schools; Eastwick, South Bookham and Great Bookham. The children from Gt.Bookham and Eastwick progress to middle school on the same sites, when they are eight. S.Bookham has no middle school, so pupils must choose one of the other schools.
At 12, pupils move to the Howard of Effingham school or another secondary school. Some parents choose to send their children to fee paying schools.
The original Victorian Bookham School is not now used and villagers hope it will become the library. Manor House School is an independant girls school.
